sn22.20:1.3: The cause and condition that gives rise to form is also not-self.
sn22.20:1.4: Since form is produced by what is not-self, how could it be self?
sn22.20:1.9: The cause and condition that gives rise to consciousness is also not-self.
sn22.20:1.10: Since consciousness is produced by what is not-self, how could it be self?
sn22.20:1.12: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
